#   Ahrefs is best known as a backlink authority checker, but it is also a
#   full SEO software suite. It provides tools for link building, keyword
#   research, competitor analysis, rank tracking, and site audits.
#   
#   Most Ahrefs features are designed for marketing and SEO professionals.
#   
#   Ahrefs stands out for its backlink database, which is one of the largest
#   collections of live links available. Its crawler recreates how search
#   engines view your site, helping you identify issues and optimize content
#   for improved search visibility.
